trans-unit.source: Contains a read-only collection of <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref> objects for each <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> in a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Contém uma coleção só de leitura de <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"> </xref> objetos para cada <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> num <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A user cannot add or remove a <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting> from the collection, but can change the properties of the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting> corresponding to a particular <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Um utilizador não é possível adicionar ou remover um <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting>da coleção, mas pode alterar as propriedades do <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting>correspondente a um determinado <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting> </xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting>

trans-unit.source: Adding or removing a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> from the DataSet adds or removes the corresponding <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar ou remover um <xref:System.Data.DataTable>do conjunto de dados adiciona ou remove correspondente <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting>da coleção.</xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection objects to a one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> instance starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Copia os objetos de coleção para um unidimensional <xref:System.Array>instância que começa no índice especificado.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the values copied from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O unidimensional <xref:System.Array>que é o destino dos valores copiados da coleção.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The index of the array at which to start inserting.
trans-unit.target: O índice da matriz no qual pretende iniciar a inserir.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection objects to a one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> instance starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Copia os objetos de coleção para um unidimensional <xref:System.Array>instância que começa no índice especificado.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the values copied from the collection.
trans-unit.target: O unidimensional <xref:System.Array>que é o destino dos valores copiados da coleção.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The index of the array at which to start inserting.
trans-unit.target: O índice da matriz no qual pretende iniciar a inserir.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"> </xref> objetos no <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting> objects is the same as the number of <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects in the <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: O número de <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting>objetos é o mesmo que o número de <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objetos no <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting>

trans-unit.source: The number of <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O número de <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"> </xref> objetos na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>para a coleção.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>objeto.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"></xref> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"> </xref> é só de leitura.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether access to the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread-safe).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o acesso à <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"> </xref> está sincronizada (seguro para thread).

trans-unit.source: This property implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade implementa o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>interface.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection> using the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas podem indique uma versão sincronizada a <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>utilizando o <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection.SyncRoot%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection.SyncRoot%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>

trans-unit.source: This property is always <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, unless overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é sempre <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, a menos que substituída por uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref> objects of the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"> </xref> objetos especificado <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> to find.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> localizar.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref> objects of the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> specified by its index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"> </xref> objetos a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> especificado pelo respetivo índice.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> to find.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> localizar.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref> of the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> specified by its name.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"> </xref> do <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> especificado pelo respetivo nome.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> to find.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> localizar.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que pode ser utilizado para sincronizar acesso para o <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection> using the SyncRoot property.
trans-unit.target: Classes derivadas podem indique uma versão sincronizada a <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>utilizando a propriedade SyncRoot.</xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>

trans-unit.source: Program code must always perform synchronized operations on the SyncRoot of the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>, not directly on the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Código do programa sempre tem de efetuar operações sincronizadas no SyncRoot do <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>, não diretamente no <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>.</xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection> </xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>

trans-unit.source: This guarantees the correct operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: Isto garante que o funcionamento correto do coleções que são derivadas de outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains the correct synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, mantém a sincronização correta com outros threads que podem ser simultaneamente modificar <xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>.</xref:System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection>

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que pode ser utilizado para sincronizar acesso para o <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSettingCollection"> </xref>.
